member.name: T:NuGet.Commands.RestoreCommandProviders
member.summary: Feed providers
Providers used by the restore command. These can be shared across restores.
member.param: Path to the global packages folder.
This is typically just a provider for the global packages folder.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreCommandProviders.GlobalPackages
member.summary: A repository may be passed in as part of the request. This allows multiple restores to share the same cache for the global packages folder and reduce disk hits.

member.name: T:NuGet.Commands.RestoreCommandProvidersCache
member.summary: Caches providers for the RestoreCommand. This helper ensures that no resources are duplicated.

member.summary: The directory in which to install packages

member.summary: A list of projects provided by external build systems (i.e. MSBuild)

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.LockFilePath
member.summary: The path to the lock file to read/write. If not specified, uses the file 'project.lock.json' in the same directory as the provided PackageSpec.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.ExistingLockFile
member.summary: The existing lock file to use. If not specified, the lock file will be read from the (or, if that property is not specified, from the default location of the lock file, as specified in the description for )

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.MaxDegreeOfConcurrency
member.summary: The number of concurrent tasks to run during installs. Defaults to . Set this to '1' to run without concurrency.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.CompatibilityProfiles
member.summary: Additional compatibility profiles to check compatibility with.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.LockFileVersion
member.summary: Lock file version format to output.
member.remarks: This defaults to the latest version.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.RequestedRuntimes
member.summary: These Runtime Ids will be added to the graph in addition to the runtimes contained in project.json under runtimes.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.PackageSaveMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the .

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.FallbackRuntimes
member.summary: These Runtime Ids will be used if and the project runtimes are both empty.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreRequest.DependencyProviders
member.summary: This contains resources that are shared between project restores. This includes both remote and local package providers.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.LockFilePath
member.summary: Gets the path that the lock file will be written to.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.RestoreGraphs
member.summary: Gets the resolved dependency graphs produced by the restore operation

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.RelockFile
member.summary: Gets a boolean indicating if the lock file will be re-written on because the file needs to be re-locked.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.LockFile
member.summary: Gets the lock file that was generated during the restore or, in the case of a locked lock file, was used to determine the packages to install during the restore.

member.name: P:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.PreviousLockFile
member.summary: The existing lock file. This is null if no lock file was provided on the .

member.name: M:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.GetAllInstalled
member.summary: Calculates the complete set of all packages installed by this operation
member.remarks: This requires quite a bit of iterating over the graph so the result should be cached
member.returns: A set of libraries that were installed by this operation

member.name: M:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.GetAllUnresolved
member.summary: Calculates the complete set of all unresolved dependencies for this operation
member.remarks: This requires quite a bit of iterating over the graph so the result should be cached
member.returns: A set of dependencies that were unable to be resolved by this operation

member.name: M:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.Commit(NuGet.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Commits the lock file contained in and the MSBuild targets/props to the local file system.
member.remarks: If and are identical the file will not be written to disk.

member.name: M:NuGet.Commands.RestoreResult.Commit(NuGet.Logging.ILogger,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Commits the lock file contained in and the MSBuild targets/props to the local file system.
member.remarks: If and are identical the file will not be written to disk.
member.param: Write out the lock file even if no changes exist.

member.param: State to be passed into the callback.
member.returns: An that is used to unregister the callback.
